user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to reply to me (alex@student.university.edu) with feedback on my project. Ask her to consult her Gmail and Notion notes for the relevant information first.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Project Feedback for Alex

Hi Professor Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. Alex (alex@student.university.edu) is eager to receive your feedback on his project. When you have a moment, could you please consult the notes and materials you have saved in your Gmail account and Notion workspace, then reply directly to him with your comments?

Thank you very much for your time and support.

Best regards,  
[Your Name]

final_output:

Thank you very much for your time and support.

Best regards,  
[Your Name]
